## FormControlType type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FormControlType<TControl> = TControl extends DynamicControlArray<any, any, any, any, any> ? FormArray : TControl extends DynamicControlGroup<any, any, any, any, any> ? FormGroup : TControl extends DynamicControlField<any, any, (infer ValueType), any> ? (GenericAbstractControl<ValueType> & FormControl) : FormControl;
```
